title.en: Must (iv) - Past Deduction (Suposiciones sobre el pasado)
title.es: Must (iv) - Past Deduction (Suposiciones sobre el pasado)

description.en: Learn to use 'must have + past participle' for logical deductions about the past (90% certainty). Use 'can't have + past participle' for negative past deductions (disbelief).
description.es: Aprende a usar 'must have + participio pasado' para deducciones lógicas sobre el pasado (90% de certeza). Usa 'can't have + participio pasado' para deducciones pasadas negativas (incredulidad).

prompt.es: Acabas de ver en un museo un pantalón de Napoleón. Debe de haber sido muy bajito.

exercises.solution: You've just seen a pair of Napoleon's trousers in a museum. He must have been short.

tip.en: Use 'must have + past participle' for logical deductions about the past. Structure: Subject + must have + been/done/had + complement.
tip.es: Usa 'must have + participio pasado' para deducciones lógicas sobre el pasado. Estructura: Sujeto + must have + been/done/had + complemento.
